page.title: 09Leisure at home
page.content: From an 11 year old boy: 'Computers are one of my favourite occupations whilst I have nothing else to do. I read a lot of books of all kinds and play many board games such as Chess, Monopoly, Subbutteo (a foot ball game), Battleships, Dover Harbour and many more. I play football,cricket tennis and other games in the garden with my brother. I like to ride my bicycle a lot. I enjoy electronic games such as Astro Wars, Munchman, Crazy Kong and Frogger. I also like to play my Space Invader game on my watch'. It is perhaps only in the past 20 years that electronics have affected every home. Putting the first man on the moon back in 1969 has had even greater effect than that first thought of.
